execution_plan.description: Compute total spend per customer in the EU region by summing orders.total_eur and attach customer metadata (email, name, country).
execution_plan.query: SELECT c.id AS customer_id, c.email, c.full_name, c.country, SUM(o.total_eur) AS total_spent_eur, 'EU' AS region FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id GROUP BY c.id, c.email, c.full_name, c.country;

execution_plan.description: Compute total spend per customer in the US region by summing orders.total_eur and attach customer metadata (email, name, country).
execution_plan.query: SELECT c.id AS customer_id, c.email, c.full_name, c.country, SUM(o.total_eur) AS total_spent_eur, 'US' AS region FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id GROUP BY c.id, c.email, c.full_name, c.country;
